data.title: David Rawlings - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: David Rawlings: his birthday, what he did before fame, his family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

Songwriter, guitarist, and producer who gained fame largely through his work with Gillian Welch. Songs of his have been featured in movies produced by the Cohen Brothers. Popular solo recordings of his include A Friend of a Friend, and Nashville Obsolete.

Before Fame

He studied music at the Berklee College of Music, with Lauren Passarelli.

Trivia

His first studio recording with Gillian was the Hell Among the Yearlings album, called A Friend of a Friend. He has worked with Ani DiFranco and Mike Harris. He plays guitars by Gibson and Fender. With music available on Spotify, he has seen his audience on the page grow, and by May 2023 his monthly listeners on Spotify had grown to more than 290,000.

Family Life

He was born in the United States.

Associated With
